projects.mainTitle: Town of DeBeque – Bluestone Valley 250,000 Gallon Finished Water Storage Tank
mainContent: WestWater Engineering completed design plans with associated applications and specifications for a new water storage tank was constructed to provide redundancy and back-up to the original rural water system.

The above-ground welded steel tank includes separate inlet and outlet lines with one-way valving configured to circulate and mix water inside the tank.  The new tank was selected to match the elevation of the existing tank so that operating levels would match eliminating operating controls or adjustments.
